phrases: The brilliant glow of this sky, does it carry right into your heart?
The melody you heard in your dream, it plays like the silence
Even if your hands are still far from that dream,
Come now and remember that kindly voice,
Someone was there singing for you, singing those chords of happiness
Sound of the sky, echo on high, break through that overwhelming sadness
Everything that shines in your eyes
Is part of the real world
Even your tears cannot leave you here to stay forever
In this light pouring down onto you, play tomorrow's song
Signal the forces to our rear.
A Mountain Hike - The End of the World
You are back on your feet again, are not you, Shuko?
She is completely healed, but she just will not leave.
Well, this place is just wonderful, after all.
How can she run around like that when it is so hot out?
Common names in the Sept region.
It is wonderful that you have friends from so far away!
I almost believed you for a second there!
Get Klaus something for the road.
Thank you for everything every time!
I will take care of the place while you are gone.
We are going on a field trip tomorrow.
Does not that sound great, Noel?
Just walking would be a bit boring, so let us play a little game while we are at it.
As you know, all along the southern edges of Seize,
in other words, the border between Seize and Nomansland,
there are surveillance devices from the ancient past.
Of these, three are due for regular maintenance checks.
I would like you to look at them during our field trip.
No, it is just your normal field trip.
We cannot do anything even if they were broken.
Noctur-Type Surveillance Devices are a complete black box.
So it is a field trip.
So this is what he meant by Good luck out there.
But just walking is putting time to waste.
will be carrying those on your backs!
To carry something like this, you have to put your body weight forward and...
You are all such good children.
You have met all of our expectations.
When you are lifting a heavy pack, first you lie back,
then once the full weight of the pack is on your back,
Filicia and I will go ahead to the goal point on your map and wait for you.
If at any point you do not think you can go on, blow your bugle.
We will come looking for you,
And there are wild animals on this mountain.
Should you encounter one, in order to handle the situation
I authorize the use of firearms,
I will leave the rest to you.
It feels like it gets heavier every time.
No, it is just that I thought about this machine protecting the town all alone, all this time.
Okay then, Noel, where is the next one?
Someone do something about these packs!
The Commander and Rio both hate me.
It is not like you to keep quiet!
I do not care what anyone says, we are getting RR!
You are not taking this very seriously.
But it is a field trip.
We have to make the most of it.
Did you forget about those stupidly-heavy sacks?
Come on now, are you blind?
But her hair is blonde and her skin is so white and she is just wonderful.
That is what is good about her.
You two are talking about a different Filicia!
Someone do something about this pair of airheads!
It will dry soon with this sun.
Back in my village, they dug up our fields pretty often.
But there is a lot of food during the summer, so they usually would not come near.
I wonder if it is okay to leave those sacks there.
Our first priority should be reaching the goal now.
Are we headed in the right direction?
The second device is at the summit of the mountain we are on.
So we just need to head up.
I wonder if there is anything we can eat...
They are sweet, a little sour, and just delicious!
But we cannot climb up that.
They say Major Klaus once crossed a desert in a tank without food or water for three days and took down an enemy fortress.
This is nothing compared to that!
They call him the Desert Wolf.
We had to get our bearings after every turn, after all.
Is this really the right way?
What do you mean by probably?
Without a compass, I cannot be completely sure.
We walked all this way for nothing?
If the compass was that important, you should have kept it with you!
Let us not start fighting now.
It is your fault for playing in the river.
You are not taking this seriously!
This is not a field trip!
You are always spacing out and smiling like an idiot!
That is why we are in this mess!
Well, it looks like they will be alright.
I got you, so get off me!
This is the end of the world we live in.
We were unable to complete the mission.
What mission are you talking about?
I said it was a field trip.
was for you to see this.
These are the signatures of those who came before us.
Every girl who comes to the fortress has come here.
It is our past, is not it?
Can you walk just a little more?
There is one more thing they left us.
But it was worth the trouble.
Love and friendship - put these feelings together
And sing of how important they are
I was so happy that I cried
It hurt so bad that I laughed
But that all just goes to show that I am alive
Let us just walk it slowly
Just tell me a bit of what you think
Love and friendship - even though they might waver
I know, you know, little happy
I want us to echo on forever
Can you hear my precious note?
All these words that there are cannot even describe it.
Next time: Kanata's Day Off - A Haircut
